workshoptitle: Get started with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Anomaly Detection

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Sign up for and log into the Oracle Cloud

tutorials.title: Introduction: Anomaly Detection
tutorials.description: Learn how to build anomaly detection model and use it for detection

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Understand Data And Download Samples
tutorials.description: Learn what data and format needed for training, and use the prepared sample data for nex steps.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Anomaly Detection Project
tutorials.description: Learn how to create AD project

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Train Anomaly Detection Model And Detect
tutorials.description: Learn how to create data asset, build and deploy model, and perform detection

tutorials.title: Lab 4: (Advanced) Access Anomaly Detection Service with Python SDKs
tutorials.description: Using Python SKD to call the AD services

tutorials.title: Lab 5: (Advanced) Access Anomaly Detection Service with OCI CLI
tutorials.description: Using OCI CLI to call the AD services

tutorials.title: Lab 6: (Advanced) How to Preprocess Raw Data
tutorials.description: How to preprocess your raw dataset for training the model and detecting

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
